name: Rahim Uddin
text: Excellent AC service! The technician was very polite and fixed the cooling issue within an hour.

name: Nusrat Jahan
text: Used their home deep cleaning service before Eid. My house looks brand new. Highly recommended!

name: Tanvir Ahmed
text: Very professional plumbing service. The booking process was super easy through the website.

name: Sadia Islam
text: Shifted my home with Sheba 360. Not a single glass broke. Very careful team.

name: Kamrul Hasan
text: Their electrician found a fault that others missed. Saved me from a big hazard. Thanks!

name: Maysha Rahman
text: Took the facial service at home. It was relaxing and the beautician was hygienic.

name: Fahim Shahriar
text: Rented a car for Cox's Bazar trip. The driver was experienced and the car was clean.

name: Rina Begum
text: Deep cleaned my sofa. All stains are gone. Very happy with the result.

name: Arif Hossain
text: Good service for painting. They finished on time but left a little mess.

name: Sharmin Akter
text: Fixed my washing machine instantly. Low cost compared to others.

name: Zahidul Islam
text: Best pest control service. No cockroaches seen for 6 months now.

name: Farhana Yeasmin
text: The cleaner was late by 30 mins but did a great job cleaning the bathroom.

name: Jamal Uddin
text: My laptop was dead. Their expert fixed the motherboard issue in 2 days.

name: Salma Khatun
text: Hired a driver for a week. Very safe driving. Will hire again.

name: Asif Iqbal
text: Office cleaning contract signed. They are very professional and punctual.

name: Nadia Sultana
text: Fridge repair was good, but the spare part took time to arrive.

name: Moniruzzaman
text: CCTV installation was neat and clean. Mobile view works perfectly.

name: Tania Ahmed
text: Water tank cleaning was thorough. The water is much cleaner now.

name: Rashed Khan
text: Carpenter fixed my wardrobe door. Good work.

name: Popy Akter
text: Interior design consultation was very helpful for my new flat.

name: Imran Hossain
text: Gas stove leak fixed. Very prompt service.

name: Keya Rahman
text: Mehndi artist for my wedding was from Sheba 360. Beautiful designs!

name: Sultan Ahmed
text: Generator servicing done well. A bit pricey but worth it.

name: Mrs. Haque
text: Elderly care nurse is very patient with my mother.

name: Bipul Roy
text: Solar panel maintenance team is knowledgeable.

name: Ishrat Jahan
text: Curtain cleaning service is convenient. They pick up and drop off.

name: Masud Rana
text: Water filter cartridge replaced quickly.

name: Laila Begum
text: Bed bug treatment worked like magic. Finally sleeping peacefully.

name: Shafikul Islam
text: Restored my old wooden chair. Looks antique now.

name: Samira Khan
text: My treadmill belt was loose, they fixed it at home.
